pizzas.title: The Classic Veggie
pizzas.description: An extra cheesy pizza on a thin and crispy base, loaded with olives and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Veggie BBQ Special
pizzas.description: Peppers and mushrooms on a special garlic base, with bbq sauce instead of the usual tomato.

pizzas.title: The Hawaiian
pizzas.description: A fruity combination of pineapply, sweetorn and mushrooms on a light, thin base.

pizzas.title: Cheese Lovers
pizzas.description: A cheese overload pizza on a classic base.

pizzas.title: The Everything
pizzas.description: All available toppings on a garlic base
